description:
Mordred is revealed to have no emotions. He had infiltrated Caislean Merlin as a child and spent his life there creating chaos in anticipation of this day, all on his father`s orders. His father, Baron Doussant, has been working toward the goal of making all infected people into slaves. Back on lang, Queen Boudica flies into a rage and attempts to destroy the machine that`s negating Fantasia, but Santori`s attack drains the last of her energy. Ocoho is captured, and Sagramore crosses swords with their childhood friend, Mordred.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vie ne tient qu`à un fil: Tragedy
The Light of Life Is Extinguished: Tragedy
